alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Walker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 9:35PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Montgomery and south central Walker Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 935 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Waverly, or near Willis, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Waverly and Montgomery. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
